name: My University's Clubs Are Boring So I Decided To Make One Myself
name_original: My University's Clubs Are Boring So I Decided To Make One Myself
description: Excited to open a new chapter of her life as a university student, Ren decides to find a way to get involved and meet new people on her first days on campus — by joining a club! However, none of them interest her, and after a brief interaction with an inspiring individual, Ren decides to form her own anime club. Proposing her idea to the Student Society, they tell her that she’ll need to find at least 3 other members to join, and thus Ren explores SFU campus looking for members interested in joining her club!
